segment.source: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server
segment.target: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server

segment.source: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server
segment.target: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server

segment.source: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server
segment.target: How to Configure the Image Web Distribution Server

segment.source: An image repository is an optional server that is used for image distribution (where administrators upload new images and client computers check the server every 15 minutes and update their image if a new one is available).
segment.target: An image repository is an optional server that is used for image distribution (where administrators upload new images and client computers check the server every 15 minutes and update their image if a new one is available).

segment.source: An image distribution server requires the following:
segment.target: An image distribution server requires the following:

segment.source: Internet Information Services (IIS)—For information, see Internet Information Services.
segment.target: Internet Information Services (IIS)—For information, see Internet Information Services.

segment.source: During the IIS installation, when adding role services, select the following supported authentication methods:
segment.target: During the IIS installation, when adding role services, select the following supported authentication methods:

segment.source: Basic Authentication
segment.target: Basic Authentication

segment.source: Windows Authentication
segment.target: Windows Authentication

segment.source: Client Certificate Mapping Authentication
segment.target: Client Certificate Mapping Authentication

segment.source: When configuring IIS, include the following:
segment.target: When configuring IIS, include the following:

segment.source: Add a virtual directory, with the alias named MEDVImages.
segment.target: Add a virtual directory, with the alias named MEDVImages.

segment.source: The physical path should point to the location of the images.
segment.target: The physical path should point to the location of the images.

segment.source: Enable BITS.
segment.target: Enable BITS.

segment.source: Add the following MIME types:
segment.target: Add the following MIME types:

segment.source: .ckm (application/octet-stream)
segment.target: .ckm (application/octet-stream)

segment.source: .index (application/octet-stream)
segment.target: .index (application/octet-stream)

segment.source: On the MED-V site, add read permissions to Everyone.
segment.target: On the MED-V site, add read permissions to Everyone.

segment.source: Restart IIS.
segment.target: Restart IIS.

segment.source: BITS Server Extensions for IIS—For information, see Install BITS Server Extensions.
segment.target: BITS Server Extensions for IIS—For information, see Install BITS Server Extensions.

segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Supported Configurations
